parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select count(*) from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active where id in (select sourceid from rf2_cr_transitiveclosuretable where destinationId = 30446011000036105 or sourceid = 30446011000036105);

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(id, 30446011000036105) AND definitionstatusid != 900000000000074008;

test.name: 03 All Container Type FSNs have a semantic tag (AU qualifier)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE isActiveConcept_cr(conceptId) AND isKindOf_cr(conceptid, 30446011000036105) AND typeid = 900000000000003001 AND term NOT REGEXP BINARY ' \\(AU qualifier\\)$';

test.name: 04 Concept 30446011000036105|container type has FSN = 'container type (AU qualifier)'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE typeId = 900000000000003001 AND conceptId = 30446011000036105 AND term != BINARY 'container type (AU qualifier)';

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE typeId = 900000000000013009 AND conceptId = 30446011000036105 AND term != BINARY 'container type';

test.name: 06b DNF All descendents of Container Types only have destinationIds that are types of 30446011000036105|container type

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isDescendentOf_cr(sourceid, 30446011000036105) AND NOT isKindOf_cr(destinationid, 30446011000036105);

test.name: 07b DNF container type(30446011000036105) is a child of 30515011000036103|Australian qualifier

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE sourceId = 30446011000036105 AND typeId = 116680003 AND destinationId = 30515011000036103 AND id != 5087551000168126;

test.name: 08b DNF container type(30446011000036105) is only a child of 30515011000036103|Australian qualifier

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE sourceId = 30446011000036105 AND typeId = 116680003 AND destinationId != 30515011000036103;

test.name: 09b DNF Container Type concepts only have 116680003|Is a relationships

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(sourceid, 30446011000036105) AND typeid != 116680003;

test.name: 10b DNF Container Type descendents only have destinationIds that are types of 30446011000036105|container type

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isDescendentOf_cr(sourceid, 30446011000036105) AND NOT isKindOf_cr(destinationid, 30446011000036105);

test.name: 11b DNF All Container Type relationships are ungrouped (group = 0)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(sourceid, 30446011000036105) AND relationshipgroup != 0;

test.name: 12b DNF All children of Container Type are the destination of at least one [30465011000036106|has container type] relationship

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(Id, 30446011000036105) AND id NOT IN (SELECT destinationid FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE typeId = 30465011000036106) and id NOT IN (SELECT destinationid FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE typeId = 116680003);
